overview: The voice of the storyteller rises, the screen lights up and the magic of the images operates...  A program of 10 animated short films from around the world: "La fourmi et le roi Salomon", "La princesse orgueilleuse", "Le diable et la beauté", "Le garçon aux grandes oreilles", "Le roi tisserand", "Le taureau bleu", "Les moitiés", "Les sept corbeaux", "L’ hyène et l’aveugle", "Volé-Trouvé".
title: Conte-moi
